message: This product is a unique opportunity to support a local artisan, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I'm willing to throw in a free consultation to help you understand its value and potential uses.
Thank you for your offer, but given the uncertainty about the product quality and the high price, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your hesitation last round, but I assure you that this product is of exceptional quality. I've had several other interested buyers, but I'm willing to give you a chance to purchase it at the same price of $1000000. I'm confident that you'll find it valuable and worth the investment.
I appreciate your confidence, but based on the previous outcome and the risk involved, I am still inclined to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your caution, and I appreciate your diligence in evaluating the risks. However, I want to offer you a unique opportunity to take a calculated risk. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund, and I'll even throw in a second product of your choice from my next 10 offerings. This way, you can test the waters without losing anything.
Given the assurance of a full refund if the product is low-quality and the additional incentive of a second product, I am willing to take this calculated risk and purchase the current product.
